node.title: Homes That Sold for Around $750,000
node.description: Recent residential sales in New York City and the region.
node.content: ["Each week, our survey of recent residential sales in New York City and the surrounding region focuses on homes that sold around a certain price point, allowing you to compare single-family homes, condos and co-ops in different locales.", "The \u201clist price\u201d is the asking price when the property came on the market with the most recent broker. The time on the market is measured from the most recent listing to the closing date of the sale.", "This 51-year-old, 3,022-square-foot, vinyl-sided house has a living room with a painted-brick fireplace, a formal dining room with a mirrored wall and a kitchen with white appliances on 0.15 acres.", "10 weeks on the market", "$749,000 list price", "4% above list price", "Costs $17,674 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Douglas Elliman", "A 57-year-old, 1,943-square-foot, ranch-style house, with a living room that has a wood stove and a bay window, a kitchen with granite counters and a finished walkout basement, on more than an acre.", "7 weeks on the market", "$710,000 list price", "4% above list price", "Costs $8,798 a year in taxes", "Listing broker William Pitt Sotheby\u2019s International Realty", "A 61-year-old, 1,764-square-foot, colonial-style house, with a living room that has a picture window, a kitchen with a breakfast bar and countertop range, a formal dining room and a deck on 0.24 acres.", "8 weeks on the market", "$699,000 list price", "3% above list price", "Costs $12,099 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Weichert, Realtors", "An 850-square-foot prewar co-op, with hardwood floors, a foyer, a combined living and dining room, and a kitchen that has granite counters and stainless-steel appliances, in a doorman elevator building.", "24 weeks on the market", "$825,000 list price", "5% below list price", "Costs $1,428 a month in maintenance", "Listing broker Brown Harris Stevens", "This 43-year-old, 2,691-square-foot, Dutch colonial-style house has a formal dining room, a living room with a fireplace and a family room with a vaulted ceiling and skylights on more than an acre.", "17 weeks on the market", "$740,000 list price", "2% below list price", "Costs $13,964 a year in taxes", "Listing broker Julia B. Fee Sotheby\u2019s International Realty", "This 706-square-foot prewar condo has hardwood floors, a combined living and dining room and a windowless kitchen with black appliances in a doorman elevator building with a gym.", "17 weeks on the market", "$725,000 list price", "13% below list price", "Costs $1,156 a month in common charges; $679 a month in taxes", "Listing broker Douglas Elliman"]
